description: Manage trusted client certificates of application gateway.

commands.name: az network application-gateway client-cert add
commands.summary: Add trusted client certificate of the application gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway client-cert add --data
                                               --gateway-name
                                               --name
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network application-gateway client-cert add --gateway-name MyAppGateway -g MyResourceGroup --name MyCert --data FilePath

commands.name: az network application-gateway client-cert list
commands.summary: List the existing trusted client certificates of the application gateway.
examples: az network application-gateway client-cert list --gateway-name MyAppGateway -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network application-gateway client-cert remove
commands.summary: Remove an existing trusted client certificate of the application gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway client-cert remove --gateway-name
                                                  --name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network application-gateway client-cert remove --gateway-name MyAppGateway -g MyResourceGroup --name MyCert

commands.name: az network application-gateway client-cert show
commands.summary: Show an existing trusted client certificate of the application gateway.
examples: az network application-gateway client-cert show --gateway-name MyAppGateway -g MyResourceGroup --name MyCert

commands.name: az network application-gateway client-cert update
commands.summary: Update trusted client certificate of the application gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway client-cert update --data
                                                  --gateway-name
                                                  --name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  [--add]
                                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--remove]
                                                  [--set]
examples: az network application-gateway client-cert update --gateway-name MyAppGateway -g MyResourceGroup --name MyCert --data FilePath

commands.name: az network application-gateway client-cert wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
